subject: Contract negotiation discussion
notes: Discussed pricing terms and implementation timeline. Customer is interested in extending the contract for an additional year. Need to prepare revised proposal.

subject: Startup package proposal sent
notes: Sent detailed proposal including platform setup, training schedule, and support terms. Included case studies from similar startups.

subject: Technical requirements review
notes: Met with technical team to review integration requirements. Identified need for custom API endpoints and data migration strategy.

subject: Product demo follow-up
notes: Follow-up call after product demonstration. Customer showed interest in advanced analytics features. Scheduled technical deep-dive.

subject: Project kickoff meeting
notes: Successful kickoff meeting with implementation team. Defined project timeline, milestones, and communication protocols.

subject: Compliance documentation review
notes: Sent compliance documentation and security audit reports. Customer's legal team is reviewing for HIPAA compliance.

subject: Risk management requirements
notes: Detailed discussion about risk assessment requirements and regulatory compliance needs. Customer emphasized real-time monitoring capabilities.

subject: Platform demonstration scheduled
notes: Scheduled comprehensive platform demonstration for next week. Will include student management and course delivery features.

subject: Customer feedback on support
notes: Customer expressed high satisfaction with current support level. Mentioned they would be interested in exploring additional modules.

subject: Prepare technical documentation
notes: Create detailed technical documentation for manufacturing integration including API specifications and data flow diagrams.
